file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Starkina Maria
    email: starkina@surfstudio.ru

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT 

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

paths:
  /promotions:
    get:
      summary: Акции пользователя
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/Promotion"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
          
  /banners/{location}:
    parameters:
      - name: location
        required: true
        in: path
        schema:
          $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BannersLocation"
        description: Место, где отображаются баннеры 
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/Banner"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /promotions/history:
    get:
      summary: История активации бонусов
      parameters:
        - $ref: "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/offset"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BonusHistoryResponse"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /promotions/{id}:  
    parameters:
          - name: id
            required: true
            in: path
            schema:
              type: string
            description: ID акции 
    get:
      summary: Запрашиваем детальную информацию по акции
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/DetailPromotion"
    post:
      summary: >
        Участие в акции. 
        Тело запроса может отстутствовать если нет никаких доп парамтров (нет бонусов, нет текстфилдов)
      requestBody:
        required: false
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AcceptPromotion"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "../common/models.yaml#/components/schemas/InfoMessage" 
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

Error: parse: /banners/{location}: parameters: parse parameter "location": schema: parse schema: reference "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BannersLocation": resolve reference "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BannersLocation": invalid schema reference "models.yaml#/components/schemas/BannersLocation"
